title: Behind Closed Doors
description: In this Dateline classic, a terrible crime has occurred in a Florida suburb, which makes little sense to police. Josh Mankiewicz reports. Originally aired on NBC on April 10, 2013.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
